title: Council Decision of 29 June 1998 appointing a member and two alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 29 June 1998 appointing a member and two alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (98/C 222/07)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Ms Mary McGINLEY is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives in place of Ms McCORMICK, for the remainder of her term of office, which ends on 22 October 1998.

Ms Catherine McCORMICK and Ms Louise SILVERTON are hereby appointed alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives in place of Ms GREENWOOD and Ms McGINLEY respectively, for the remainder of their term of office, which ends on 22 October 1998.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 29 June 1998.
For the Council
The President
R. COOK
(1) OJ L 33, 11.2.1980, p. 13.
(2) OJ C 292, 7.11.1995, p. 2.
(3) OJ C 99, 2.4.1996, p. 3.
